channel.title: Mark's Prayer Site
channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 9, 2026 Today's Verse James 1:12 [12] Blessed is the man who remains steadfast under trial, for when he has stood the test he will receive the crown of life, which God has promised to those who love him. Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable.
